column46: TEMPDESC:Without tools, you must improvise, and you take a -2 circumstance penalty

column48: TEMPDESC:Attempting an Open Lock check without a set of thieves' tools imposes a -2 circumstance penalty on the check

column52: TEMPDESC:If you are riding bareback, or attempt to ride a creature that is ill suited as a mount, you take a -5 penalty on Ride checks.
